search_results.title: Lovestained
search_results.lyrics:
Lovestained Lyrics[Intro]
I’ll make it better for you
I-I’ll, I’ll make it better for you
I-I’ll, I’ll make it better for you

[Verse 1]
I’ll make it better
I’ll make it better
You never have to worry about me
I’ll make it better
Baby, there’s no pressure
This love is made for us, you’ll see
[Pre-Chorus]
Fruit gets ripe and it’s love
Bite and angels sing up above
It’s never enough just to say you’re lovestained
Fruit gets ripe and it’s love
Bite and angels like to get rough
Tooth and nail when it gets too much
You need to make me lovestained
You need to make me lovestained

[Chorus]
I’ll make it better for you
I-I’ll, I’ll make it better for you
I-I’ll, I’ll make it better for you
You need to make me lovestained

[Verse 2]
Slipping back into happiness
'Cause you give me more time
To live a life that sings like mine
You make me drowsy with delight
And I’m slipping back into feeling blessed
'Cause you are so damn fine
And I’ll skip into the sunlight with you
And skip back at midnight
You might also like[Chorus]
I’ll make it better for you
I-I’ll, I’ll make it better for you
I-I’ll, I’ll make it better for you
You need to make me lovestained
I’ll make it better for you
I-I’ll, I’ll make it better for you
I-I’ll, I’ll make it better for you

You need to make me love stained

You need to make me love stained7Embed

search_results.title: Blue
search_results.lyrics:
Blue LyricsYou are like broken ribs, you are scratched up skin
You sleep softly tonight, don’t know the pain I’m in
You are a starry ache, can’t decide if you’re cruel
But it’s better to be burnt by the sun than to be chased by wolves

I will skip to you slick with love til you’ve had enough
Stroll in my patchwork skin til the love I’m in rests inside you too
Don’t make me blue, blue, blue
Don’t make me blue, blue, blue

Drunk on the evening sun, sleeping in the blue
Angels break bread then they run, I could fall right through
I can feel you running through my veins, and my soul goes cold
I fall harder when you say my name, moontime never gets old
I will skip to you slick with love til you’ve had enough
Stroll in my patchwork skin til the love I’m in rests inside you too

Don’t make me blue, blue, blue
Don’t make me blue, blue, blueYou might also likeEmbed

search_results.full_title: Leave It On The Dancefloor by Hope Tala
search_results.title: Leave It On The Dancefloor
search_results.lyrics:
Leave It On The Dancefloor Lyrics[Verse 1]
Step to the left, boy, your girl's left
But you said you wanna stay
So you step to the right, acting real shy
'Cause you gave your heart away
Then you take it on back, feelings on track
'Cause you don't know what to say
Come on, move it in closer, everyone know
How you're feeling, baby

[Pre-Chorus]
Ooh, the night is young and, baby, so are you
Let's have some fun, I promise there's no rules
Don't let nobody tell you what to do
When you groove
[Chorus]
So, come on, leave it on the dance-floor
Leave your worries all behind and let the night
Take the pain away
Come on, leave it on the dance-floor
Move your body close to mine, yeah, it's alright
Just let the night take the pain away

[Verse 2]
I know you and her feel all of this heartache
And you need somebody who can show you a party
I've been there, too, yeah, I'm just like you
If you kiss me, you got nothing to lose
You know that

[Pre-Chorus]
Ooh, the night is young and, baby, so are you
Let's have some fun, I promise there's no rules
Don't let nobody tell you what to do
When you groove

[Chorus]
So, come on, leave it on the dance-floor
Leave your worries all behind and let the night
Take the pain away
Come on, leave it on the dance-floor
Move your body close to mine, yeah, it's alright
Just let the night take the pain away
You might also like[Bridge]
Step to the left, step to the right
How you feeling, baby?
Move it like that, bring it on back
Get a little crazy, oh

[Chorus]
So, come on, leave it on the dance-floor
Leave your worries all behind and let the night (Let the night)
Take the pain away
Come on, leave it on the dance-floor
Move your body close to mine, yeah, it's alright
Just let the night take the pain awayEmbed

All My Girls Like To Fight Lyrics[Verse 1]
I lick their hands clean of bark and bite
So they can sleep deep at night
Ah, all my girls like to fight
I wish I could throw the first punch
But purity coats my tongue
Ah, oh, and I'm not gonna be the one to try

[Chorus]
You like to make me suffer
Thought we loved one another
Ghosts of all your old lovers around
Be quiet, don't make a sound
'Cause all your girls like to fight

Thought we loved one another
Ghosts of all my old lovers around
Be quiet, don't make a sound
'Cause all my girls like to fight

Two with a sword, stick, strikе and defend

Closes her eyes when she's counting to ten
Four with the bullseye shot
Five with the flare when the target's hot
Mmm, mmm
Six with a stake pushed straight through your heart
Seven's a tough one, savage and smart
Eight with the reflex fast, it's a defect
Looks in your eyes when she strikes, it's an art
Nine with a arrow and a bow
Ten with the Glock stashed away on the low
Mmm, mmm

[Chorus]
You like to make me suffer
Thought we loved one another
Ghosts of all your old lovers around
Be quiet, don't make a sound
'Cause all your girls like to fight
I like to make you suffer
Thought we loved one another
Ghosts of all my old lovers around
Be quiet, don't make a sound
'Cause all my girls like to fight
You might also like[Post-Chorus]
Fight, fight, fight, fight
All my girls like to fight
Fight, fight, fight, fight
All my girls like to fight

[Outro]
Mmm
Throw the first punch
Now that we're done
Better put down your gun
Put your fists up or run (Ah)
Mmm mmm
Mmm
Throw the first punch
Now that we're done
Better put down your gun
Put your fists up or run (Ah)
Mmm mmm4Embed

search_results.title: Tiptoeing
search_results.lyrics:
Tiptoeing Lyrics[Chorus]
How you gonna make me do this dance again?
We're getting closer but we're trying to be friends
If we start it might never end, so we keep tiptoeing

[Verse 1]
When we met I wasn't interested
I did half a glance, didn't want to chance it
Now I lie awake and I think about you

[Pre-Chorus]
Because there's a moral to this story but I don't know it
Always listen to myself but not this time I guess
Keep on running from it, when I want it, I do
[Chorus]
How you gonna make me do this dance again?
We're getting closer but we're trying to be friends
If we start it might never end, so we keep tiptoeing
I drag my heels 'cause I just can't walk away
Fantasising if you want to you could stay
And be my baby but our hearts might break
So we keep tiptoeing

[Verse 2]
It's forbidden but I still want you
I wanna taste the fruit, but I just can't chance it
So much at risk and I'm scared to lose

[Pre-Chorus]
And there's a moral to the story but I've lost my head
There's a million different secrets we should leave unsaid
Should be running from it, when I want it, I do

[Chorus]
How you gonna make me do this dance again?
We're getting closer but we're trying to be friends
If we start it might never end, so we keep tiptoeing
I drag my heels 'cause I just can't walk away
Fantasising if you want to you could stay
And be my baby but our hearts might break
So we keep tiptoeing
You might also like[Bridge]
Tiptoes, tiptoes, you got me on my tiptoes, tiptoes
We want to but we both know, both know there’s too much to lose

[Chorus]
How you gonna make me do this dance again?
We're getting closer but we're trying to be friends
If we start it might never end, so we keep tiptoeing
I drag my heels 'cause I just can't walk away
Fantasising if you want to you could stay
And be my baby but our hearts might break
So we keep tiptoeing

[Outro]
Tiptoes, tiptoes, you got me on my tiptoes, tiptoes
We want to but we both know, both know there’s too much to loseEmbed

search_results.full_title: Stayed at the Party by Hope Tala
search_results.title: Stayed at the Party
search_results.lyrics:
Stayed at the Party Lyrics[Verse 1]
One day we'll all be gone
No trace left of this song
You and me
Ashes and dust
All that's left of us
And that's been on my mind
No answers there to find
Silly me
Thinking too much
[Pre-Chorus]
There's no medicine
To put inside our cups
To keep us here long enough but
I'd like to put a fight up

[Chorus]
So I'll just stay at the party
Dance till my feet hurt
Tell all my friends I love them for no reason
Just know that one day
When I'm not near them
They might remember tonight it's alright
'Cause we stayed at the party

[Verse 2]
Maybe I've got it wrong
I know something else beyond
It'll be you and I together again our kindred by our sides (Our sides)
It's been on my mind (My mind)
We're running out of time
Silly me
Can't get it right (Can't get it right)

[Pre-Chorus]
There's no medicine
To put inside our cups
To keep us here long enough but
I'd like to put a fight up
You might also like[Chorus]
So I'll just stay at the party
Dance till my feet hurt
Tell all my friends I love them for no reason
Just know that one day
When I'm not near them
They might remember tonight it's alright
'Cause we stayed at the party

[Bridge]
The time will come when I'm alone
Flying somewhere never to return, no, no
Will I have my memories of home?
Will I be scared of the unknown?
Who knows?
Who knows?

[Chorus]
So I'll just stay at the party
Smile till my cheeks hurt
Tell all my friends I love them for no reason
Just so that one day
When I'm not near them
They will remember tonight it's alright 'cause I stayedEmbed

search_results.title: Cherries
search_results.lyrics:
Cherries Lyrics[Verse 1: Hope Tala]
The cherries in your mouth spill stars
Scarlet venom to keep in jam jars
We all build worlds with joined-up scars
But your constellation has stained my guitar
And the French in your mouth breaks ribs
Makes heads go light and hands lose their grip
Pulling teeth behind a bottom lip
To look for cherry stones and rotting apple pips

[Pre-Chorus: Hope Tala]
Sunlight eats your skin, look at the state we're in
Look at the state we're in, look at the state we're in
The glare gets in my eyes, please drink the tears I cry
Drink up the tears I cry, drink up the tears I cry
[Chorus: Hope Tala]
Don't leave me here alone
Drink up the tears I cry
Drink up the tears I cry
But don't leave me here alone
Drink up the tears I cry
Drink up the tears I cry

[Verse 2: Aminé]
Mela verde in my cup, tell me what the fuck's for lunch
Is it your pussy or dinner? Both seems like the same to us
Dracula to your neck, I was tryna relieve stress
You look yummy in that dress, I expect nothin' less
Chain keeping swinging in your mouth
Now the chain stained with some cherry lip gloss
Tequila ya tears, so we move state to state
Sippin' on your sorrows as I fuck you by the lake
Look
Turn around and bust it back, one time
Give you this dick and you relapse, two times
Waking up to clothes all over your apartment
Pearls on your neck, Sauvignon on the carpet
Road trips to Nice, but we ain't goin' up to Greece
Baby, I'm the one you call Aminé in the sheets
A lot of text messages that I wanna delete
But to get over the state we in, I just cop you Céline
You might also like[Pre-Chorus: Hope Tala]
Sunlight eats your skin, look at the state we're in
Look at the state we're in, look at the state we're in
The glare gets in my eyes, please drink the tears I cry
Drink up the tears I cry, drink up the tears I cry

[Chorus: Hope Tala]
Don't leave me here alone
Drink up the tears I cry, drink up the tears I cry
But don't leave me here alone
Drink up the tears I cry, drink up the tears I cry

[Outro: Aminé]
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah (Ooh)
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah (Ooh)
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah (Ooh)
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah (Ooh)
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah (Ooh)
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah (Ooh)1Embed

search_results.title: Anywhere
search_results.lyrics:
Anywhere Lyrics[Intro]
Ah-ah

[Verse 1]
I've always known a little bit
Since I was a little kid
Love is gonna come
And when it comes, we'll see light different
But we never stop bickering
The flame is barely flickering
Maybe it's me, I need to let it be, consider it
We need to scream
We need to shout
We need to fight
We need blood, sweat, and tears
And a bump in the night
And then we can make up
And you know what that's like
A big dose of lovin' and we'll be alright
I haven't felt this way since high school
I'm sorry, I know you feel lied to
I can't explain it but I tried to give you the words
You said through my hands when I fly with the birds
[Chorus]
You throw me, throw me like water
And maybe it's not fair
Take me anywhere, anywhere
Anywhere, anywhere
The days are getting shorter
Push the sunset through my hand
Take me anywhere, anywhere

[Verse 2]
I never tried to string you along
Guess I never went above and beyond
But baby, we don't belong together, together
We don't belong together
I never tried to string you along
Guess I never went above and beyond
But baby, we don't belong, belong
Belong

[Chorus]
You throw me, throw me like water
And maybe it's not fair
Take me anywhere, anywhere
Anywhere, anywhere
The days are getting shorter
Push the sunset through my hand
Take me anywhere, anywhere
You might also like[Outro]
Take me anywhere
Take me anywhere (Ah)
Baby, take me anywhere
Take me anywhere (Ah)
Baby, take me anywhere (Ah)
Take me anywhere (Ah)
Baby, take me anywhere (Ah)
Take me, take me (Ah)Embed

Ba ba ba ba ba ba
Ba ba ba ba ba ba ah

[Verse 1]
